review: Cipro (ciprofloxacin):This drug is a blessing and a curse. I've had repeated bouts of osteomyelitis having been on cipro for months at a time. Not mention seven surgeries and one amputation to resolve the infections. Cipro got rid the infection but did cause three of my teeth to become brittle and break. So please use caution when using this medication
I found ciprofloxacin  to work well though it was not so good on my tendons and stomach. It kills the bone infection in my right wrist which is fantastic
Cipro (ciprofloxacin):Right below knee amputation, right open fracture femur lead to osteomyelitis, non-union, 30 days of Cipro cleared the infection. Delayed union with plate interlocking done.
